review.title: “Great learning experience”
review.pros: Pros – K-Swiss offers a great learning experience even when starting out. Good chance to grow personally. Very friendly employees and atmosphere
review.cons: Cons – Poorly run with very little communication between management and lower employees. Hard to speak up and have your voice heard.

review.title: “An amazing rise followed by the disappoint truth that Management lost sight of it's true vision for success.”
review.pros: Pros – The opportunity to work on design in every area of the business including, advertising, product photography art direction, packaging, branding and more.
review.cons: Cons – No raises for 8 yrs in a row. No advancement. No growth.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Design your way out of the problem. Get someone with a true business background but not from the footwear industry.

review.title: “The Pros and Cons of working at the company called K-Swiss.”
review.pros: Pros – Laid back atmosphere and friendly co-workers.
review.cons: Cons – Forced to "clock-in", very little opportunity to move up the corporate ladder, no travel.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Clear and open communication across all categories to have a unified vision of who and what K-Swiss is.
